channel.title: Alien grunt beign crowbared
channel.description: Hi, sry, I searched but didnt find any similar thread... so when u get close to alien grunt and u crowbar him, he wont attack you..not sure if bug or its planned or what

item.title: Alien grunt beign crowbared
item.dc:creator: DreamSphinx
item.description:
In HL1, couldn’t you continuously stun an alien grunt with the crowbar so they couldn’t attacK? Maybe it’s an intentional reference to HL1.
